head.title: New Essex County Chief Sworn In

hedline.hl1: New Essex County Chief Sworn In

block.p: LEAD: Nicholas R. Amato, right, with his wife, Barbara, and Governor Kean after being sworn in yesterday in Newark as Essex County Executive. Mr. Amato, a former Democrat, became a Republican and defeated the incumbent, Peter Shapiro, in last November's general election. (NYT/Fred R. Conrad)

LEAD: Nicholas R. Amato, right, with his wife, Barbara, and Governor Kean after being sworn in yesterday in Newark as Essex County Executive. Mr. Amato, a former Democrat, became a Republican and defeated the incumbent, Peter Shapiro, in last November's general election. (NYT/Fred R. Conrad)

Nicholas R. Amato, right, with his wife, Barbara, and Governor Kean after being sworn in yesterday in Newark as Essex County Executive. Mr. Amato, a former Democrat, became a Republican and defeated the incumbent, Peter Shapiro, in last November's general election. (NYT/Fred R. Conrad)
